# Receipts

## View

> Returns JSON structured like this:

```json
{
  "data": {
    "ReceiptRefNum": 85,
    "Name": "SliceReceipt(Email)",
    "Subject": "Customer Receipt (James Jomuad - Zylun)",
    "FromEmail": "Slyce<support@completegateway.com>",
    "Target": "email",
    "ContentType": "both",
    "TemplateHTML": "",
    "TemplateText": ""
  }
}
```

This endpoint retrieves specific receipt.

### HTTP Request

`GET receipts/<RECEIPTID>`

### URL Parameters

Parameter | Description
--------- | -----------
RECEIPTID | The ID of the receipt to retrieve.

## View All

> Returns JSON structured like this:

```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "ReceiptRefNum": 85,
      "Name": "SliceReceipt(Email)",
      "Subject": "Customer Receipt (James Jomuad - Zylun)",
      "FromEmail": "Slyce<support@completegateway.com>",
      "Target": "email",
      "ContentType": "both"
    },
    {
      "ReceiptRefNum": 82,
      "Name": "SliceReceipt(Printed)",
      "Subject": "",
      "FromEmail": "support@tmcode.com",
      "Target": "print",
      "ContentType": "html"
    },
}
```

This endpoint retrieves all receipts.

### HTTP Request

`GET receipts/`

## Create

> Returns JSON structured like this:

```json
{
  "data": {
    "ReceiptRefNum": 132,
    "Name": "This is name",
    "Subject": "Sending subject as test",
    "FromEmail": "support@completegateway.comasdfsdaf",
    "Target": "print",
    "ContentType": "html",
    "TemplateHTML": "testasdf",
    "TemplateText": ""
  }
}
```

This method lets you create the receipt.

### HTTP Request

`POST receipts/`

### Query Parameters

Parameter | Default | Description
--------- | ------- | -----------
name* |  | Name of the receipt
subject* |  | Subject of the receipt
from_email* |  | Subject of the receipt
target* |  | Target ( print | email )
template_html* |  | Html format (Required If "template_text" is not provided)
template_text* |  | Text format (Required If "template_html" is not provided)

<aside class="notice">* = Required.</aside>

## Delete Receipt

> Returns `true` on successful

This method lets you delete a receipt.

### HTTP Request

`DELETE receipts/<RECEIPTID>`

### URL Parameters

Parameter | Description
--------- | -----------
RECEIPTID | The ID of the receipt to be deleted.

## Send Receipt

> Returns `true` on successful

This method lets you send a receipt.

### HTTP Request

`POST receipts/send`

### Query Parameters

Parameter | Default | Description
--------- | ------- | -----------
email* |  | Email 
refnum* |  | Referrence number of the transaction
receiptRefNum* |  | Reference number of the receipt template to be used in sending the receipt.

<aside class="notice">* = Required.</aside>
